name: Largo
description:
Welcome to Largo!

Largo is a game in the style of I'm on Observation Duty, where you monitor security cameras and spot differences in various locations.

Enter a world with an eerie post-apocalyptic atmosphere where humanity has disappeared without a trace. As a survivor, your task is to examine different abandoned and liminal spaces, and report anomalies.

Stay vigilant for unexpected guests and make it through to dawn!

Features

  • Report hundreds of anomalies across four dilapidated settings: an arctic log cabin, an office space, a supermarket and an opera house
  • Click on objects to file a report
  • Select from four levels of difficulty
  • Encounter a wide array of anomalies, from the easily noticeable to those that are incredibly subtle
  • Face entities in various spine-chilling scenarios
  • Earn Steam Achievements for conquering the Nightmare mode and reporting Special Anomalies
